name: A ghost memories
description:
You incarn a little girl’s ghost lost in a dark and mysterious forest. She will progress and brave monsters to recover her memory.

This is a rogue lite turn-base game. How many runs will you need to reach and defeat the final boss ?

-

The game is still in developpement. Our team made this project during Hackathon ReadyPlayer42 event (September 2020).

Here is a free demo you can try, containing part one of the game. A surprise awaits you if you complete the demo final challenge !

To complete the demo, defeat the boss at least once with each skill unlocked.
